summary.description: A Fast, Accurate and General Approach for Automated Detection and Landmarking of Biological Structures in Images | Machine-learning-based morphometrics | Machine-learning tools for landmark-based morphometrics | Porto & Voje (2019) A fast, accurate and general model for automated landmarking of biological images. Submitted | Also note that while ml-morph can handle multiple image file formats, some care is needed with regards to the presence of special characters in image filenames. So far, we have only had problems with &, but it is possible that other special characters might lead the software to throw out an error
summary.name: ML-morph
